API_URL.description: The root-url to your api. For example if you want to call the GitHub API: 'https://api.github.com/'

API_KEY_NAME.description: The name of your API key. This can be something like: 'apiKey', 'apikey', 'appid', 'access_token'

API_KEY_VALUE.description: The value of your API key. The long string after '=' :)

DNS_RESTRICT.description: Set to a DNS FQDN containing an A record if you'd like to restrict use of this server only to those IPs.
